thread.title: John Owendoff
thread.title_full: Auto Lenders reviewed by John Owendoff

author: John Owendoff
title: John Owendoff
text: I had not originally planned to purchase another vehicle as I already had one that I was using for my commute from Middletown->Princeton. i had visited the Toms River location for the sole reason of selling my 2011 Honda Civic LX Sedan. I was disappointed at the offer ($4100) and decided to spin the notion of buying another vehicle and doing a trade-in on the Civic. As a result, I received $5000 for the trade and ended up driving off with a 2013 Honda CRZ (I wanted another hybrid vehicle). Both Will Griffin and Phil worked with me every step of the way including having the vehicle driven from the Voorhees location so I could take a test drive before making a final decision. Pleasantly, I decided to go ahead. Everyone @ AL was very helpful. I especially appreciate the time that Will spent with me. I'l be sure to recommend AL to my family and friends. Thanks for an excellent buying experience.
